generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.dragonflaming Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to use a flame-breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Time (in seconds) between each start of the cycle to roar, then breath flame. Default value: 10.

fields.title: Flame Time
fields.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame. Default value: 0.5.

fields.title: Ground Flame Count
fields.description: Number of ground flame-breath attacks to use before flight-takeoff. Default value: 4.

fields.title: Roar Time
fields.description: Time (in seconds) to roar, before breathing flame. Default value: 2.
